item.title: Website Hosting Services A Bovine Beyond The Cow of Duty
item.description: Considering a new website or a change for your existing one? Look no further than FatCow, where affordable web hosting meets exceptional service. Don’t let the name fool you; FatCow is anything but cheesy. Unlike other website hosting companies, FatCow provides excellent service without inflated prices, hidden fees, or complicated setups. They are also environmentally conscious, utilizing 100% wind energy. Starting at $3.67 per month with a 30-day money-back guarantee, FatCow offers a free domain name, unlimited disk space and bandwidth, unlimited POP mailboxes, MySQL Databases, and the ability to host multiple domains on one account.

item.title: Why Wireless Is The New Copperâ€¦ But Not The New Fiber
item.description: By: John Shepler A couple of weeks ago, a portion of the world experienced a communication blackout. This disruption wasn’t caused by governments or hackers, but by a powerful typhoon named Haiyan, which devastated the Philippines, resulting in thousands of casualties, millions displaced, and communication infrastructure crippled. Natural disasters often obliterate infrastructure, including buildings, roads, radio towers, power lines, and telephone wires. Rebuilding these systems, which took years to develop, is a long and arduous process.
